content: There’s another leaping jump he can perform to twist his body high in the air like his brother before crashing down, only this attack also sends his head slamming into the ground. This can work in your favor with a well-timed dodge, as he slowly recovers while grabbing his head from the impact.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
There’s another leaping jump he can perform to twist his body high in the air like his brother before crashing down, only this attack also sends his head slamming into the ground. This can work in your favor with a well-timed dodge, as he slowly recovers while grabbing his head from the impact.
